description: black; desk-style; rectangular with flat upper surface; black, round buttons with white numbers; black cord
text: Thoroughly modern, yet elegant, this Danish telephone recalls the sophistication of the black tux and party dress.  The matte black coupled with the absence of letters on the number buttons conveys an austere dignity.  Weighing less than two pounds, its ring consists of soothing electronic trills.
title: "DanMark Classic" push-button telephone
